cast.name: 查尔琳·克洛赫西 Charleene Closshey
布赖恩·艾姆斯 Brian Ames

this_title: The Past Is Never Dead: The Story of William Faulkner
trans_title: 过去永不消亡：威廉·福克纳的故事
introduction: Using never before seen imagery and stories, The Past is Never Dead explores the life of one of America's best authors, William Faulkner. The documentary cuts together re-enactment, archival, and interview footage to portray Faulkner's story of love, rejection, heartache, and perseverance.
chinese_title: 过去永不消亡：威廉·福克纳的故事
foreign_title: The Past Is Never Dead: The Story of William Faulkner
